# ThingsAI - Ideas, Learning, and AI Explorations

A platform for sharing ideas, memos, and explorations in AI and computational thinking.

## Site Structure
- Blog posts: /en/blog/
- Quick memos: /en/memos/
- Ideas showcase: /en/ideas/
- Long-form essays: /en/essays/

## Author
Written by Jeff Omhover
Professional portfolio: https://jfomhover.info
